nodes.text: Ask your questions.
Then do not bother me any more.
Yes, I will gladly carry your message to Modoc.

I knew you would understand. Here is a message relaying our request. Please take it to Modoc and give it to the person in charge. Return here when your task is complete. I will tell the Protectors to expect your return. We thank you for doing us this service.

Years ago, someone tried to take over our farm, harvesting crops and stealing animals they had no right to. We are not a violent people by nature, but something had to be done. Our survival at the time depended on those crops. That’s when we came up with the ghost idea. Smearing ourselves with glowing fungus, we were able to scare away this person and any other nosy neighbors. Unfortunately, this has been a little too effective. Lately, we’ve been seeking to make contact with the surfacers, but no one comes to the farm anymore for fear of the ghosts. Luckily, you dropped by.

Once, long ago, we were once like the surfacers. We too dwelled above ground, until the world above caught fire. Our ancestors -- who were part of a secret militia -- sealed themselves and their families down here for protection. For generations, down here we’ve remained, safely hidden within the womb of Mother Earth.

A visitor - how convenient. I’ve been contemplating on a way to make contact with the surfacers, but now I don’t have to worry about that -- thanks to your timely arrival. Welcome to the home of the  Slags.
You have proven your trustworthiness without doubt. Despite the fact that we'll miss little Jonny down here, we have arranged an escort for you and Jonny to go back to Modoc right now.

Since the Sealing, we, as a people, have changed. Few can bear to be on the surface because they are not used to having a black sea of nothingness above them. The sensation of falling upward is so great for them that they lie frozen, clutching the ground. But that is not the main reason. All of us cannot stand the bright light of that which you call the sun; living underground for so long has made our eyes too sensitive to light. We cannot travel far from the safety of our homes beneath the ground.
Ask your questions.

Oh boy! No wonder you weren’t scared away by our little tricks. You’re too stupid to be scared. I hate to depend on such an intellectually challenged individual, but we have need of your services. Take this message to Modoc. Give to leader of Modoc and try not to get lost.

We are a peaceful people, and have killed no one. Those bodies are merely props we manufactured to scare off those who try to steal from us. If you examine the bodies closely, you’ll notice that they are nothing but brahmin guts and dummies.

I am sorry to hear that. Please consider yourself a guest of the Slags. When we finally establish contact with the surfacers, you will be allowed to leave. Until then, do not try to the leave the caves - the consequences would be most unpleasant.

We are a peaceful people, and have killed no one. Those bodies are merely props we manufactured to scare off those who try to steal from us. If you examine the bodies closely, you’ll notice that they are nothing but brahmin guts and dummies.
Please enlighten us with your wisdom.
About what?

Was that his name, Karl? We scared him off the farm, nothing more. I assume he went back home when he discovered the farm was haunted. The Protectors reported him headed west. You might try searching for him that way.
How good of you to return. I take it you have delivered the message to Modoc, then. How was it  received?
Enough! No more questions. Make your decision now!
Hmm… I understand. Such a decision cannot be made lightly. Please keep me informed of their  progress.

We scared him off the farm -- nothing more. I assume he went back home when he discovered the farm was haunted. The Protectors reported him headed northwest. You might try searching for him that  way.

Please let me apologize for the unpleasant circumstances under which we meet. Normally, the Protectors would have tried to scare you off. Usually rattling chains and some low moaning is enough to scare anybody off, but recently they have been instructed to bring any surfacers they find  to me.
You will go IF and WHEN I decide you can go. Not before.
I am sorry; I cannot help you.
Have you reconsidered helping us?

Our population steadily increased since the Sealing. It soon became apparent that we could no longer survive down here without further supplies. So the Seal was broken, and we once again looked to the surface for survival.
forced_node

I see you’ve met Jonny. We found him wandering in the darkness of one of our deepest tunnels. He said he had fallen down a dry well by his house, and then was trapped in a tunnel by a cave in. We have treated him as one of our own and he is loved by all -- so you will understand that I am wary of entrusting him to a stranger who has yet to prove himself to me as trustworthy. I will return Jonny when I am sure he will make it home safely.
Fair enough. I wouldn’t expect anyone to blindly accept tasks from strangers without first learning a little bit about them, first. Ask your questions, and I will answer them as best I can.
With the completion of the new irrigation systems, our food supply far exceeds our needs. We wish to establish trade with the surfacers and exchange surplus foods for much needed medicines.

How typical of surfacers. Never doing anything for anyone unless there is some kind of personal gain involved. Obviously, we cannot trust such a person as you. We will find someone else to deliver the message. Although we are not a violent people, do not attempt to leave the caves or you will regret it.

links.text: Why did you come back to the surface?
What is the purpose of your message?
Why don’t you send one of your own people to deliver the message?
I have heard enough. I am ready to make my decision.
What are your defenses?
Why the big ghost charade on the surface?
Tell me about your people.
What do I get out of this?
I have many questions to ask before I can possibly take this mission.
I have heard enough. I am ready to make my decision.
Can I ask you some more questions?
I have heard enough. I am ready to make my decision.
Can I ask you some more questions?
What do you want with me?
I'll just be going now.
Ghosts?
What do you want with me?
I have heard enough. I am ready to make my decision.
Can I ask you some more questions?
Why don’t you send one of your own people to deliver the message?
I have heard enough. I am ready to make my decision.
What are your defenses?
Tell me about your people.
Then what about poor Karl? You know, the farmer that was living on your farm?
I’ll keep you informed of my progress.
I am sorry; I cannot help you.
Yes, I will gladly carry your message to Modoc.
They don’t trust you. After all, you kill passersby and stake the bodies out in front of your  farm.
They want to know what happened to the farmer that was living here.
I’ll keep you informed of my progress.
They need time to think it over.
They have some reservations.
I want to take Jonny home to his parents.
I am sorry; I cannot help you.
Yes, I will gladly carry your message to Modoc.
They don’t trust you. After all, you kill passersby and stake the bodies out in front of your  farm.
Ghosts?
That’s all right. I’ll just be going now.
What do you want with me?
What do you want with me?
What do I get out of this?
I have many questions to ask before I can possibly take this mission.
The answer is still no.
I have decided to help you.
I want to take Jonny home to his parents.
I need to ask you some questions, first.
Can I ask you some more questions?
I have heard enough. I am ready to make my decision.
Why don’t you send one of your own people to deliver the message?
What are your defenses?
I have heard enough. I am ready to make my decision.
Tell me about your people.
I have heard enough. I am ready to make my decision.
Can I ask you some more questions?
